il.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>; Rani Aboulhosn <Rani.Aboulhosn@chalhoub.com>; Government Affairs <Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RSO UAE - STORE Re-Opening - Guess – Dubai Marina Mall 
 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a Re-Opening of “GUESS Boutique at Dubai Marina Mall” .

 

the handover from project team is on Thursday 31st Oct, and the opening date is on Saturday 02nd Nov 2024.

 

To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.

 

Best Regards,

 

RAMEZ ZEBDIE​​​​
SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO
ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC
DUBAI

Cc: Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>; Rani Aboulhosn <Rani.Aboulhosn@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: RSO UAE - STORE RENOVATION - Guess – Dubai Marina Mall
Importance: High

 

Dear Team,

 

Hope you are doing well,

 

As per our minutes of meeting for renovation plan of Guess – Dubai Marina Mall, the location will be temporary closed and last trading date is 07th Aug 2024, Handover to Mall on 10th Aug 2024.

The boutique is expected to re-open for business on October 2024 (date TBC).

 

To ensure a smooth closure, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time.

 

*	Apply for Mall and Police permits (Merchandise, Non-Merchandise transfer (Store team and logistic) / IT Equipment, Traffic counter, and CCTV Dismantling) @Olga <mailto:Olga.Bakhareva@chalhoub.com> 
*	IT Equipment dismantling on 10th Aug 7 AM / Service request please to be raised @Rizaldy <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>  @Ali <mailto:Alizeb.Siyal@chalhoub.com> 
*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different one on 07th Aug at the EOD @Olga <mailto:Olga.Bakhareva@chalhoub.com> 
*	Please arrange TG team to collect the Cash Deposit on 08th Aug 2023 / Ensure freeze of the Cash Collection Service Agreement till Oct 2024 @Ghouse <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com> 
*	Please Arrange Sefa team to dismantle the NVR and CCTV on 10th Aug  7AM  @Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Lorena <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com>  @Pierre <mailto:Pierre.Baasolo@chalhoub.com>  to Hold services on 9th Aug (cleaning – pest control) till opening.

chalhoub.com>; Rani Aboulhosn <Rani.Aboulhosn@chalhoub.com>; Government Affairs <Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: RSO UAE - STORE Re-Opening - Guess – Dubai Marina Mall
Importance: High

 

Project Update

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have a Re-Opening of “GUESS Boutique at Dubai Marina Mall” .

 

the handover from project team is on Friday 08th Nov, and the opening date is on Sunday 10th Nov 2024.

 

@Maitha Alhashmi <mailto:Maitha.Alhashmi@chalhoub.com>  please arrange deep cleaning on 08th Nov before trading hours. Water dispenser to be delivered on 09th Nov before trading hours.

 

@Rizaldy Amada <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com> , please arrange equipment insulation and internet connection by 08th Nov Morning time.

 

@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  please ensure TG service is arranged starting on 10th Nov. Please to arrange 2000 AED float cash and 300 petty cash, Dear @Muhammed Sweadan <mailto:Muhammed.Sweadan@chalhoub.com> , please approve the same.

 

@Olga Bakhareva <mailto:Olga.Bakhareva@chalhoub.com>  please ensure CC devices and manual invoice book is returned to store on 08th Nov.

 

@Foyzul Choudhury <mailto:Foyzul.Choudhury@chalhoub.com>  please raise logistic appointment request to deliver stock to store.

 

@Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  please arrange Insurance certificate and share it with store team as soon as readiness.

 

Best Regards,

 

RAMEZ ZEBDIE​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

Subject: RE: RSO UAE - STORE RENOVATION - Guess – Dubai Marina Mall
Importance: High

 

Dear Team,

 

Hope you are doing well,

 

As per our minutes of meeting for renovation plan of Guess – Dubai Marina Mall, the location will be temporary closed and last trading date is 07th Aug 2024, Handover to Mall on 10th Aug 2024.

The boutique is expected to re-open for business on October 2024 (date TBC).

 

To ensure a smooth closure, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time.

 

*	Apply for Mall and Police permits (Merchandise, Non-Merchandise transfer (Store team and logistic) / IT Equipment, Traffic counter, and CCTV Dismantling) @Olga <mailto:Olga.Bakhareva@chalhoub.com> 
*	IT Equipment dismantling on 10th Aug 7 AM / Service request please to be raised @Rizaldy <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>  @Ali <mailto:Alizeb.Siyal@chalhoub.com> 

*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different one on 07th Aug at the EOD @Olga <mailto:Olga.Bakhareva@chalhoub.com> 
*	Please arrange TG team to collect the Cash Deposit on 08th Aug 2023 / Ensure freeze of the Cash Collection Service Agreement till Oct 2024 @Ghouse <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com> 
*	Please Arrange Sefa team to dismantle the NVR and CCTV on 10th Aug  7AM  @Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Lorena <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com>  @Pierre <mailto:Pierre.Baasolo@chalhoub.com>  to Hold services on 9th Aug (cleaning – pest control) till opening.
